name: Mining 3
description:
bad game made in scratch about mining

(v 1.1)

added yellow ore, bomb blocks, indestructible blocks and graphical overhaul

(v1.2)

added RAINBOW ORE!, chests, randomized player colour, fixed bugs involving explosives, clipping into walls and floating, buffed red and green ore

(v1.3) 

added modes (time trial and freeplay), fixed some bugs with mining, buffed red and green ore AGAIN?!
